__e: I don't like him, and I don't think Arthur's capable of seeing him clearly.
The way you went after Arthur back there-- it was out of character.
I sometimes feel the same about Arthur and he's still alive.
If you love Arthur, and I believe you do... then I know you'll do what's best for him.
That's it, now you just trust your Uncle Arthur and everything will be all right.
That is, Arthur is the name of her father,
Which is too bad in a way... because Arthur's the one that really knows.
Whatever your brother says, Arthur, it's the same old world.
I know, let me handle Arthur.

...do come round in the morning, Arthur, I can't talk now.

Arthur, you still haven't told me what to get you.
- and he doesn't know a thing about it!
